definition: what one acquires/one's gains
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
income tax
What you see is what you get (WYSIWYG)
there is no gain without a loss (idiom)/there is no such thing as a free meal
pinyin: you3 suo3 de2 bi4 you3 suo3 shi1

sentences.english: 1913 - The USA introduces an income tax.
I was level with my friend in the examination；we got the same number of marks.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的朋友考試成績一樣，我們所得分數相同。

sentences.english: The auctioneer's services are paid for in the form of …
sentences.chinese: 提示了這一段講的是拍賣人所得的利潤。

sentences.english: The inspectors soon saw through his scheme to avoid paying income tax.
sentences.chinese: 稽查員一眼就看穿了他企圖逃避繳納所得的詭計。

sentences.english: Where a crime is committed as mentioned in any Article of this Decision, all his earnings and property illegally obtained shall be confiscated;
sentences.chinese: 犯本決定各條罪的，其違法所得的一切財物予以沒收。

sentences.english: The conclusion accords with the simply supported bridge.
sentences.chinese: 所得結論與簡支梁橋一致。

sentences.english: This yields NT$18,000 or so of disposable income for each person in the household every month.
sentences.chinese: 得出家中每人每月可支配所得是一萬八千多元。

sentences.english: And they took their cattle, and their goods, which they had gotten in the land of Canaan, and came into Egypt, Jacob, and all his seed with him
sentences.chinese: 他們又帶着迦南地所得的牲畜，貨財來到埃及。

sentences.english: Technical development cost can be deducted from the taxable income.
sentences.chinese: 技術開發費抵扣應納稅所得額。

sentences.english: In addition, the transfer of housing but also for value-added part of the paid income tax.
sentences.chinese: 此外，房屋轉讓時還要爲增值部分繳納個人所得稅。

sentences.english: Must all the personal income tax be with-held and paid by institution?
sentences.chinese: 個人所得稅都是代扣代繳的嗎？

sentences.english: So I believe in a very progressive tax on income.
sentences.chinese: 所以我更信奉一個非常“激進”的所得稅體系。

sentences.english: The word "collagen" is derived from kolla, the Greek word for glue.
sentences.chinese: 單詞“膠原蛋白”是從科拉所得，對膠希臘字。

sentences.english: Third, regional differences are also shown in the various income elasticities .
sentences.chinese: 再者，省市間差異亦顯現在所得彈性上。

sentences.english: The income tax is to be reimposed next year after ten years' exemption.
sentences.chinese: 所得稅經過十年的豁免後將於明年重新徵收。

sentences.english: The deposits of silver obtained are uniform, non-porous and have electrical properties .
sentences.chinese: 所得銀的沉積物均勻，無孔且具有電性能。

definition: amount/sum of money/fixed number
to transfer (income, profits etc) to higher authorities
surplus/profit
to deduct
reward/remuneration
to make a profit/to earn a packet
remainder/surplus
to hand over to/to give to higher authority/to seek connections in high places
funds/a sum of money/CL:宗[zong1]
to give a present/to accord (a favor)/to grant
variant of 贈予|赠予[zeng4 yu3]
to take in/income/revenue/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]
to convert (between currencies)
(in) return/reciprocation/payback/retaliation/to report back/to reciprocate
restitution/return of something to its original owner/remittance
earnings/profit
